name: SEEP Universe
description: Kick butt in this retro 2D action-platformer! SEEP Universe is an indie game for PC inspired by the 8-16 bit era!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256MB Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The game is very fun and well done for an independent game. I liked the art and music style. I really recommend to everyone because it will have so much fun.

This game the perfect homage/love song to all the best retro platformers out there! It's borrows many of the succesful elements of games like Double Dragon, Mario and Earthworm Jim with great art stykle and MELT YOUR FACE OFF MUSIC! I LITERALLY had to stop myself from playing just so I can get on with other things in life (like family, and eating and stuff)! If you love retro games, then d yourself a favor. BUY THIS GAME!
